page.title: 01General View
page.content:
The area included in our square is part of the Green Belt around London. This is an area of woodland, farmland and parkland forming a green ring around London where building is restricted. Epsom and Ashtead Commons form the largest part of this block and consist of wooded and open grassland open to the public to enjoy and also an area where animals and birds can live and breed.
Nature trails are organised during the Summer months and horses are often seen being riden along the many signposted rides.
Walkers too have many paths to follow over the commons and locals living around the common can be seen taking their dogs for walks.
